Summary: This bright object did not belong
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around December 20th 1957
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 12 yrs old at the time and had been interested in Astronomy for about a year. It was about 7pm and my parents and I were walking to our car parked on the street. I was always looking at the stars and that night was no different. I saw what was a dull lite object moving very slowly almost right above me. As I stared at it I saw that it was boomerang shaped with lights along the edges. Maybe about 4 or 5 lights on each side. I told my parents and they were in the car already. Told me to get in the car and that was it. I don't think I have told many this story since but have recently started reading about UFO's. Found your website and reported it. The sighting has always been on my mind for all these years. Thanks for giving me the opportunity to finally tell someone that will listne.
